name: Lattice Performance
description: Integrate with Lattice Performance to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Users
tools.description: List users from Lattice. Returns names, emails, titles, and department information.

tools.name: Get User
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Lattice user by their ID.

tools.name: List Goals
tools.description: List goals from Lattice. Optionally filter by owner, status, or time period.

tools.name: List Reviews
tools.description: List performance review cycles from Lattice. Returns review cycle names, statuses, and date ranges.

tools.name: Get Feedback
tools.description: Get feedback entries from Lattice. Optionally filter by recipient or giver.
